About Dragon Ball Z

Dragon Ball Z is a Japanese anime television series produced by Toei Animation. It is the sequel to the original Dragon Ball anime and adapts the latter 325 chapters of the original 519-chapter Dragon Ball manga series created by Akira Toriyama.
